mapper.insert: insert into ecs_route (route_id, route_name, start_province_id, start_city_id, midpoint_province_id, midpoint_city_id, end_province_id, end_city_id, transport_price, remark) values (#{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpointProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpointCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select route_id, route_name, start_province_id, start_city_id, midpoint_province_id, midpoint_city_id, end_province_id, end_city_id, transport_price, remark from ecs_route where route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
